scenes.description: Countdown and cinematic intro for the FLOW GLOW 3D Debut Live featuring cars racing through a neon city.
AZKi introduces the group and welcomes the audience to the stage.
Performance of the song 'FG ROADSTER' by FLOW GLOW.
MC break: AZKi interacts with the audience and introduces the next song.
Performance of the song '24K GOLD' by FLOW GLOW.

subtitles.original: Yeah, this is FLOW GLOW from hololive DEV_IS.
subtitles.english: Yeah, this is FLOW GLOW from hololive DEV_IS.

subtitles.original: お待たせしました！
subtitles.english: Thank you for waiting!

subtitles.original: FLOW GLOW 3Dお披露目ライブ、MAKE IT, BREAK IT だ！
subtitles.english: It's the FLOW GLOW 3D Debut Live, MAKE IT, BREAK IT!

subtitles.original: 楽しむ準備できてますかー！
subtitles.english: Are you ready to have fun?!

subtitles.original: Yeah, 導体ぶっ放すエンジン 第七感持ってる源氏
subtitles.english: Yeah, the engine blasts the conductor, Genji with the seventh sense.

subtitles.original: ロックするこの世界全人類 この5人でゲームをチェンジ
subtitles.english: Locking onto all of humanity in this world, these five will change the game.

subtitles.original: 唸る四輪 発射せよ 皆さん サンキュー サランヘヨ
subtitles.english: Roaring four wheels, fire away. Thank you everyone, saranghaeyo.

subtitles.original: 操る二台のターンテーブル 獲る一番ここグランドゼロ
subtitles.english: Operating two turntables, taking first place right here at ground zero.

subtitles.original: エイ！リスク越えて挑戦 チャンス乗せた打倒線
subtitles.english: Ay! Challenge beyond the risk, a overthrowing strike riding on a chance.

subtitles.original: 昇り詰める頂点 騒乱全歴史笑点
subtitles.english: Climbing to the top, the climax of all chaotic history.

subtitles.original: 乗り込むFG ROADSTER 特殊部隊集合 能力者
subtitles.english: Climb into the FG ROADSTER, special forces gathering of psychics.

subtitles.original: この歴史に名残 彫刻家 ぶっちぎりでお片付け 孤独車
subtitles.english: Leaving a mark on this history, like a sculptor. Blowing past everyone to clean up, in my lone car.

subtitles.original: 今 光速でぶち抜いていく大気圏
subtitles.english: Now piercing through the atmosphere at the speed of light.

subtitles.original: エンジンからジェットの炎入れている火気厳
subtitles.english: Jet flames from the engine, strict fire control.

subtitles.original: 感懐に広がる大帖超えていく海域勢
subtitles.english: Crossing the great ledger spreading into the cold sea, sea area power.

subtitles.original: バックミラーにPeek-a-boo 映ってるIBM ファイヤー
subtitles.english: Peek-a-boo in the rearview mirror, IBM reflected. Fire!

subtitles.original: ぶち上げデカい華とんでくウチラ世代
subtitles.english: Blasting off, big flowers flying, our generation.

subtitles.original: この燃料朽ち果てない イケすぎでしょ シンデレラタイム
subtitles.english: This fuel won't rot away. It's too cool, right? Cinderella time.

subtitles.original: We are 飛んでデカいビジョン 燃えてるメンバー一途
subtitles.english: We are flying with a big vision, the members are burning with single-mindedness.

subtitles.original: 同 タイム現在進行形 超えてく世界規模
subtitles.english: Same time, present progressive, going global.

subtitles.original: 空腹なモンスター 静かなモンスター エイリアンズサバイバー FGパーティハ
subtitles.english: Hungry monster, quiet monster. Aliens survivor, FG party is...

subtitles.original: 光出すロードスター ヘビーブースター 目覚めてく本能は 青い炎
subtitles.english: The shining roadster, heavy booster. The awakening instinct is a blue flame.

subtitles.original: We are fans, let's go out 情けない風を食らわす 空まで 飛んで 走るFGモンスター
subtitles.english: We are fans, let's go out. Making the pathetic wind eat dust. Flying to the sky, running, the FG monster.

subtitles.original: 唸るブースター FG ROADSTER 3D 今 Chase me
subtitles.english: Roaring booster, FG ROADSTER 3D, now chase me.

subtitles.original: プロミのみんな、楽しんでますかー！
subtitles.english: Everyone in the Promise, are you having fun?!

subtitles.original: FGちゃんたちも、もっともっとかます準備できてるー？
subtitles.english: Are you FG girls ready to kick it up even more?

subtitles.original: FG ROADSTERに続いてはこの曲、24K GOLD だ！
subtitles.english: Following FG ROADSTER is this song, 24K GOLD!

subtitles.original: 我々、駆け抜けれスーパーカー 金ピカの光 異次元
subtitles.english: We are the supercars racing through. A gold brilliance from another dimension.

subtitles.original: 荒れ果てた世界パトロール 掻き払って踊れ
subtitles.english: Patrolling the desolate world, sweep it away and dance.

subtitles.original: 私たち存在がジャンキー
subtitles.english: Our very existence is junkies.

subtitles.original: いつでも万端な準備
subtitles.english: Always fully prepared.

subtitles.original: まるで無敵の宇宙人
subtitles.english: Like invincible aliens.

subtitles.original: ジュンジュン リアル今準備
subtitles.english: Jun-jun, really preparing now.

subtitles.original: サイコブレイク ナイツげき
subtitles.english: Psycho Break, night's play.

subtitles.original: ハイボルテージ 毎度ステキ
subtitles.english: High voltage, always wonderful.

subtitles.original: 最速でIS 愛を送る
subtitles.english: At the highest speed, IS, sending love.

subtitles.original: 今の勝ってる波のウェーブ
subtitles.english: The winning wave right now.

subtitles.original: 1、2、3番地 最新の
subtitles.english: Lot 1, 2, 3, the latest.

subtitles.original: みんなで遊ぼう 最近どう？
subtitles.english: Let's all play together. How've you been lately?

subtitles.original: 流れてるアブローラー 哀気道
subtitles.english: The flowing ab-roller, aikido.

subtitles.original: 戦闘力 マイデザイン
subtitles.english: Combat power, my design.

subtitles.original: やるじゃん 100%
subtitles.english: Not bad, 100%.

subtitles.original: この爆発力は含蓄
subtitles.english: This explosive power has depth.

subtitles.original: 目つきに興味ないルパン三世
subtitles.english: Lupin III who's not interested in looks.

subtitles.original: この輝きならばいざカミング
subtitles.english: If it's this brilliance, then come on.

subtitles.original: 神風、受けなびかせ ククク病バレ レベルアップ ップップップップ
subtitles.english: Kamikaze, catch it and let it flutter. Heh heh heh, the sickness is exposed. Level up-pup-pup-pup-pup-pup.

subtitles.original: 心を突き動かせ ククク病バレ レベルアップ ップップップップ
subtitles.english: Stir your heart. Heh heh heh, the sickness is exposed. Level up-pup-pup-pup-pup-pup.

subtitles.original: Look at me なびまとうプライス スーツは 24K GOLD Ready to go
subtitles.english: Look at me, draped in price. The suit is 24K GOLD, Ready to go.

subtitles.original: 深い闇照らす輝き 24K GOLD Ready you go
subtitles.english: A brilliance that lights up the deep darkness. 24K GOLD, Ready you go.

subtitles.original: 空飛んでるワッサー
subtitles.english: Flying in the sky, wassup.

subtitles.original: このケープがスーパーっす
subtitles.english: This cape is super cool.

subtitles.original: 見なぎってるパワーは
subtitles.english: The power that's overflowing...

subtitles.original: 戦ってるスーパーガール
subtitles.english: ...is a fighting super girl.

subtitles.original: 全身駆け巡る満タンのガソリン
subtitles.english: A full tank of gasoline running through the whole body.

subtitles.original: 黄金の流星だ パッと見
subtitles.english: At first glance, a golden meteor.

subtitles.original: 忍者みたいハンズアップ 激アツ
subtitles.english: Like a ninja, hands up, super hot.

subtitles.original: 弱点からいってかっこいい
subtitles.english: Starting from my weaknesses, so cool.

subtitles.original: 戦う 高まる
subtitles.english: Fighting, rising.

subtitles.original: 黄金の精神 現る
subtitles.english: The golden spirit appears.

subtitles.original: 渋谷 新宿 原宿
subtitles.english: Shibuya, Shinjuku, Harajuku.

subtitles.original: 風となりちはやぶる
subtitles.english: Becoming the wind, mighty and fierce.

subtitles.original: 絶体絶命 命令ない
subtitles.english: Desperate situation, no orders.

subtitles.original: アベンジャーズみたいな精鋭隊
subtitles.english: An elite squad like the Avengers.

subtitles.original: 生成AIにはないオーラ
subtitles.english: An aura that generative AI doesn't have.

subtitles.original: 盛ってる輝く生命体
subtitles.english: A shining living being that stands out.
